title: Shard Ledger Entry
description: Schema for recording interactions that generate or involve synergy shards

entity_a.description: Identifier or name of the first entity in interaction

entity_b.description: Identifier or name of the second entity in interaction

shard_signature.description: Unique code or description of the observed synergy shard

synergy_score.description: Numeric score (e.g., 0–10) representing intensity or clarity of synergy

ka_pressure_type.description: Primary Ka pressure driving this shard interaction

timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of when the interaction occurred or was logged

persistence_rating.description: Rating (e.g., 1–5) for how long or stable the shard persists

notes.description: Optional free-text field for additional context or observations
